CAREER SUMMARY  
 
Apr 2015 to date AECOM Middle East Limited, United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, 
Oman, Qatar  
 
Jan 2022 to date  
Position: Human Resources Business Partner – Middle East  
Duties & Responsibilities:  
Support the Business in Managing & Delivering HR services:  
• Consult and strategize with business leaders on employee, managerial, 
organizational and business issues, while effectively utilizing HR tools  
• Review and update HR policies and procedures in co mpliance with local Labor 
Law 
• Participate in and rollout global strategic initiatives related to employee 
diversity, career development, succession planning etc.  
    
• Establish, develop and maintain strong relationships with business partners 
and management  to gain an understanding and knowledge of business 
requirements  
• Manage HR disciplinary issues and offer practical solutions, including but not 
limited to development plans, coaching etc.  
• Investigate a variety of employee -related issues, incidents, com plains and 
inquiries  
• Support management in retention and succession planning  
• Ensure compliance requirements are met to manage and mitigate potential 
risks to the Business  
• Manage the development, implementation and effective delivery of a variety of 
HR programs including but not limited to onboarding, employee training, 
compensation programs, employee relations, performance management, 
organizational changes, conflict mediation and resolution  
• Advise the business on strategic plans, budgets, goals and  outcomes  
• Foster a cohesive team and promote a positive work environment that 
encourages innovation and collaboration  
• Strategize and manage annual compensation planning cycle, including but not 
limited to running a full staff talent review, handling bu siness alignment 
sessions, managing budget breakdown and supporting managers in year end 
conversations . 
 
Oct 2020 to Dec 2021  
Position: Senior Advisor – Human Resources Operations  
Duties & Responsibilities:  
Support the Business in Managing & Delivering HR services:  
• Establish and run resource management unit for internal staff  
• Manage employee exit and transfer process  
• Support employees and managers in adapting to changes in the business and 
shifts in the  workplace environment  
• Maintain close contact with employees through regular HR visits to multiple 
sites and offices in the region  
• Support HRBP in compensation planning cycle  
• Support HRBP in the performance management process including 
performance ap praisals, salary adjustments, and career progression plans  
• Assist with the development of and realization of strategic plans, budgets, goals 
and outcomes  
 
May 2018  to Oct 2020  
Position: Advisor – Human Resources Operations  
Duties & Responsibilities:  
• Provide advice to the Business, management team and employees  
• Help managers understand and proactively address HR disciplinary issues  
• Support HRBP in disciplinary matters and career development plans  
• Assist in the exit formalities and process to ensure a smooth transition out of 
the business  
 
    
Jan 2017 to April 2018  
Talent Acquisition Coordinator  
Duties & Responsibilities:  
• Source, prescreen, arrange interviews and coordinate between hiring 
managers and possible  
• candidates

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
